Django==4.2.5  # Replace with your desired version of Django
djangorestframework==3.14.0  # If using Django REST Framework
gunicorn==20.1.0  # For deploying with Gunicorn (optional)
psycopg2-binary==2.9.6  # For PostgreSQL support (optional)
mysqlclient==2.1.1  # For MySQL support (optional)
sqlite3  # If using SQLite (default Django database)
pytest-django==4.5.2  # For testing with pytest (optional)
pytest==7.4.0  # General testing library
coverage==7.2.2  # To measure code coverage (optional)
